verses.text_madani: يس
verses.translation: Ya Seen.

verses.text_madani: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Quran full of wisdom

verses.text_madani: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Most surely you are one of the messengers

verses.text_madani: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a right way.

verses.text_madani: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: A revelation of the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.text_madani: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.translation: That you may warn a people whose fathers were not warned, so they are heedless.

verses.text_madani: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Certainly the word has proved true of most of them, so they do not believe.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: Surely We have placed chains on their necks, and these reach up to their chins, so they have their heads raised aloft.

verses.text_madani: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have made before them a barrier and a barrier behind them, then We have covered them over so that they do not see.

verses.text_madani: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is alike to them whether you warn them or warn them not: they do not believe.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: You can only warn him who follows the reminder and fears the Beneficent Allah in secret; so announce to him forgiveness and an honorable reward.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Surely We give life to the dead, and We write down what they have sent before and their footprints, and We have recorded everything in a clear writing.

verses.text_madani: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And set out to them an example of the people of the town, when the messengers came to it.

verses.text_madani: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: When We sent to them two, they rejected both of them, then We strengthened (them) with a third, so they said: Surely we are messengers to you.

words.translation: but they denied both of them

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said: You are naught but mortals like ourselves, nor has the Beneficent Allah revealed anything; you only lie.

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said: Our Lord knows that we are most surely messengers to you.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And nothing devolves on us but a clear deliverance (of the message).

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They said: Surely we augur evil from you; if you do not desist, we will certainly stone you, and there shall certainly afflict vou a painful chastisement from us.

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said: Your evil fortune is with you; what! if you are reminded! Nay, you are an extravagant people.

verses.text_madani: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And from the remote part of the city there came a man running, he said: O my people! follow the messengers;

verses.text_madani: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: Follow him who does not ask you for reward, and they are the followers of the right course;

verses.text_madani: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: And what reason have I that I should not serve Him Who brought me into existence? And to Him you shall be brought back;

verses.text_madani: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: What! shall I take besides Him gods whose intercession, If the Beneficent Allah should desire to afflict me with a harm, shall not avail me aught, nor shall they be able to deliver me?

verses.text_madani: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: In that case I shall most surely be in clear error:

verses.text_madani: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: Surely I believe in your Lord, therefore hear me.

verses.text_madani: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said: Enter the garden. He said: O would that my people had known

verses.text_madani: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Of that on account of which my Lord has forgiven me and made me of the honored ones!

verses.text_madani: وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any hosts from heaven, nor do We ever send down.

verses.text_madani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was naught but a single cry, and lo! they were still.

verses.text_madani: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: Alas for the servants! there comes not to them an messenger but they mock at him.

verses.text_madani: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not consider how many of the generations have We destroyed before them, because they do not turn to them?

verses.text_madani: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And all of them shall surely be brought before Us.

verses.text_madani: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign to them is the dead earth: We give life to it and bring forth from it grain SQ they eat of it.

verses.text_madani: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We make therein gardens of palms and grapevines and We make springs to flow forth in it,

words.translation: and We caused to gush forth

verses.text_madani: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: That they may eat of the fruit thereof, and their hands did not make it; will they not then be grateful?

verses.text_madani: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Glory be to Him Who created pairs of all things, of what the earth grows, and of their kind and of what they do not know.

verses.text_madani: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign to them is the night: We draw forth from it the day, then lo! they are in the dark;

verses.text_madani: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs on to a term appointed for it; that is the ordinance of the Mighty, the Knowing.

verses.text_madani: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And (as for) the moon, We have ordained for it stages till it becomes again as an old dry palm branch.

verses.text_madani: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: Neither is it allowable to the sun that it should overtake the moon, nor can the night outstrip the day; and all float on in a sphere.

verses.text_madani: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a sign to them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship.

verses.text_madani: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We have created for them the like of it, what they will ride on.

verses.text_madani: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: And if We please, We can drown them, then there shall be no succorer for them, nor shall they be rescued

words.translation: (would be) a responder to a cry

verses.text_madani: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: But (by) mercy from Us and for enjoyment till a time.

verses.text_madani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them: Guard against what is before you and what is behind you, that mercy may be had on you.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And there comes not to them a communication of the communications of their Lord but they turn aside from it.

verses.text_madani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them: Spend out of what Allah has given you, those who disbelieve say to those who believe: Shall we feed him whom, if Allah please, He could feed? You are in naught but clear error.

verses.text_madani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?

verses.text_madani: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They wait not for aught but a single cry which will overtake them while they yet contend with one another.

verses.text_madani: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: So they shall not be able to make a bequest, nor shall they return to their families.

verses.text_madani: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: And the trumpet shall be blown, when lo! from their graves they shall hasten on to their Lord.

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They shall say: O woe to us! who has raised us up from our sleeping-place? This is what the Beneficent Allah promised and the messengers told the truth.

verses.text_madani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: There would be naught but a single cry, when lo! they shall all be brought before Us;

verses.text_madani: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: So this day no soul shall be dealt with unjustly in the least; and you shall not be rewarded aught but that which you did.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
verses.translation: Surely the dwellers of the garden shall on that day be in an occupation quite happy.

verses.text_madani: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.translation: They and their wives shall be in shades, reclining on raised couches.

verses.text_madani: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: They shall have fruits therein, and they shall have whatever they desire.

verses.text_madani: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: Peace: a word from a Merciful Lord.

verses.text_madani: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: And get aside today, O guilty ones!

verses.text_madani: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Did I not charge you, O children of Adam! that you should not serve the Shaitan? Surely he is your open enemy,

verses.text_madani: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And that you should serve Me; this is the right way.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And certainly he led astray numerous people from among you. What! could you not then understand?

verses.text_madani: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: This is the hell with which you were threatened.

verses.text_madani: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: Enter into it this day because you disbelieved.

verses.text_madani: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: On that day We will set a seal upon their mouths, and their hands shall speak to Us, and their feet shall bear witness of what they earned.

verses.text_madani: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And if We please We would certainly put out their eyes, then they would run about groping for the way, but how should they see?

verses.text_madani: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And if We please We would surely transform them in their place, then they would not be able to go on, nor will they return.

verses.text_madani: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And whomsoever We cause to live long, We reduce (him) to an abject state in constitution; do they not then understand?

verses.text_madani: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We have not taught him poetry, nor is it meet for him; it is nothing but a reminder and a plain Quran,

verses.text_madani: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: That it may warn him who would have life, and (that) the word may prove true against the unbelievers.

verses.text_madani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not see that We have created cattle for them, out of what Our hands have wrought, so they are their masters?

verses.text_madani: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And We have subjected them to them, so some of them they have to ride upon, and some of them they eat.

verses.text_madani: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And therein they have advantages and drinks; will they not then be grateful?

verses.text_madani: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have taken gods besides Allah that they may be helped.

verses.text_madani: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: (But) they shall not be able to assist them, and they shall be a host brought up before them.

verses.text_madani: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore let not their speech grieve you; surely We know what they do in secret and what they do openly.

verses.text_madani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Does not man see that We have created him from the small seed? Then lo! he is an open disputant.

verses.text_madani: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he strikes out a likeness for Us and forgets his own creation. Says he: Who will give life to the bones when they are rotten?

verses.text_madani: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: He will give life to them Who brought them into existence at first, and He is cognizant of all creation

verses.text_madani: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: He Who has made for you the fire (to burn) from the green tree, so that with it you kindle (fire).

verses.text_madani: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Yea! and He is the Creator (of all), the Knower.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command, when He intends anything, is only to say to it: Be, so it is.

verses.text_madani: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore glory be to Him in Whose hand is the kingdom of all things, and to Him you shall be brought back.
